item.title: Giving Sublime Text 2 A Try
item.description: Looks like Rob Conery got back in the blogging mood and picked a rather interesting subject. His topic? The holy war prone land of text editors Though I will say, his title for the post Code Editor Thunderdome. is awesome. Acutally, the blog itself is really a pretty good read with lots of good information for several editors that are worth checking out. So why exactly am I writing a post about Sublime Text 2?
